description: 30-45岁人群新陈代谢退行性机制与干预核心数据资料包

mechanism.zh: 线粒体效率下降，ATP生成减少，氧化应激（ROS）增加
mechanism.en: Decreased mitochondrial efficiency, reduced ATP production, increased oxidative stress (ROS)

references.key_findings: Mitochondrial function decline is a hallmark of aging
Mitochondrial dysfunction leads to metabolic decline

mechanism.zh: 身体从高效的氧化磷酸化转向低效的糖酵解，这是一种类似衰老和肿瘤的代谢特征
mechanism.en: Shift from efficient oxidative phosphorylation to less efficient glycolysis, a metabolic feature similar to aging and tumors

metabolic_markers.RER_shift: 从0.75提升至0.85，表明燃料偏好从脂肪转向葡萄糖
metabolic_markers.substrate_preference: Shift from fat oxidation to glucose utilization

references.key_findings: Metabolic reprogramming is characteristic of aging cells

mechanism.zh: 胰岛素敏感性下降（胰岛素抵抗前兆），生长激素/性激素下降；慢性低度炎症（Inflammaging）由IL-17/TNF-α驱动
mechanism.en: Decreased insulin sensitivity (precursor to insulin resistance), declining growth/sex hormones; chronic low-grade inflammation (Inflammaging) driven by IL-17/TNF-α

IL17_TNF.description: IL-17和TNF炎症通路通过SASP（衰老相关分泌表型）激活

SASP.description: 衰老细胞分泌促炎细胞因子和代谢物

references.key_findings: BZBS (Bazi Bushen) suppresses IL-17/TNF inflammatory pathways and SASP, improving metabolic homeostasis
references.evidence: Transcriptomic analysis showed BZBS inhibited arachidonic acid-linoleic acid metabolism and restrained IL-17/TNF pathways

references.key_findings: Inflammaging is a key driver of metabolic decline

app_habit_recommendation.zh: 每日30分钟Zone 2低心率跑或快走
app_habit_recommendation.en: Daily 30-minute Zone 2 low heart rate running or brisk walking

references.key_findings: Exercise intervention effectively reverses age-related metabolic decline

app_habit_recommendation.zh: 每周3次自重深蹲或俯卧撑（保住肌肉量）
app_habit_recommendation.en: 3 times/week bodyweight squats or push-ups (preserve muscle mass)

metabolic_benefits.muscle_mass_preservation: Prevents age-related muscle loss (1-2% per year after 30)
metabolic_benefits.metabolic_boost: Each pound of muscle burns 6-7 calories/day at rest

references.title: Aging-Related Sarcopenia: Metabolic Characteristics and Therapeutic Strategies
references.key_findings: Sarcopenia is characterized by metabolic changes including altered amino acid metabolism, decreased mitochondrial function, and impaired protein synthesis

app_habit_recommendation.en: 16:8 intermittent fasting or control dinner carbohydrates

metabolic_benefits.autophagy: Activates cellular autophagy and repair mechanisms

references.key_findings: Intermittent fasting improves metabolic markers and insulin sensitivity

app_habit_recommendation.zh: 摄入Omega-3（深海鱼）或多酚（黑咖啡/绿茶）
app_habit_recommendation.en: Intake of Omega-3 (fatty fish) or polyphenols (coffee/green tea)

anti_inflammatory_effects.polyphenols: Neutralizes ROS and activates Nrf2 antioxidant pathway

references.key_findings: Omega-3 and polyphenols effectively reduce oxidative stress markers

app_habit_recommendation.zh: 早餐/练后补充优质蛋白（如鸡蛋、乳清蛋白）
app_habit_recommendation.en: Supplement quality protein at breakfast/post-workout (eggs, whey protein)

anabolic_response.mTOR_activation: Leucine activates mTOR pathway for protein synthesis
anabolic_response.muscle_protein_synthesis: Increases MPS by 30-50% when combined with exercise

references.key_findings: Leucine supplementation enhances protein synthesis in aging individuals

AgeXtend_AI_antiaging.title: AgeXtend: AI-driven discovery of anti-aging molecules
AgeXtend_AI_antiaging.key_innovation: 利用AI/机器学习预测具有抗衰老潜力的天然分子
AgeXtend_AI_antiaging.app_application: 可在App的【饮食建议】板块标注【AI甄选抗衰食材】并引用此研究作为背书

blood_metabolic_clock.title: Blood cell metabolic atlas in aging
blood_metabolic_clock.key_innovation: 血液中的代谢物（如尿苷）水平可以直接反映衰老程度

key_metabolites.name: Uridine
key_metabolites.role: Marker of aging, supplementation may restore stem cell vitality

clinical_markers.uric_acid: Associated with metabolic syndrome and inflammation
clinical_markers.nucleotides: Reflect cellular energy state and repair capacity

blood_metabolic_clock.app_application: 如果App对接体检数据，可重点分析尿酸和尿苷相关指标；建议用户多吃富含核苷酸的食物

energy_expenditure_aging_index.title: Energy Expenditure Aging Index (EEAI)
energy_expenditure_aging_index.key_innovation: 首个基于能量消耗的衰老指数，使用代谢笼参数评估生物学年龄
key_findings: Natural aging results in progressive decline in energy expenditure (EE)
Respiratory Exchange Ratio (RER) increases from ~0.75 to ~0.85 with age, indicating shift from fat to glucose utilization
Age-related decline in EE correlates with visceral fat accumulation and hepatic steatosis
BZBS treatment reversed age-related decline in EE by ~50%
BZBS enhanced PPAR signaling, fatty acid β-oxidation, and cholesterol metabolism
BZBS suppressed IL-17/TNF inflammatory pathways and SASP

therapeutic_implications.interventions: Traditional Chinese medicine (BZBS) can reverse metabolic aging
therapeutic_implications.biomarkers: EEAI provides non-invasive longitudinal monitoring vs DNA methylation clocks

primary_concerns.ai_recommendation: 抗阻训练 + 蛋白质补充

reference_database.note: Inflammation & TCM - EEAI, BZBS, IL-17/TNF pathways
